00039 class PropMap : protected std::map<util::istring, _internal::treeNode>

00092         key_list k;
00093         std::for_each( begin(), end(), walkTree<Predicate>( k ) );

00233     template<typename DST> bool transform( key_type from, key_type to, bool delSource = true ) {
00234         check_type<DST>();
00235         return transform( from, to, Type<DST>::staticID, delSource );

00239     // Additional get/set - Functions
00241     //@todo make sure the type specific behaviour is as documented
00247     template<typename T> PropertyValue &setProperty( const key_type &key, const T &val ) {
00248         PropertyValue &ret = propertyValue( key );
00249 
00250         if( ret.empty() ) {
00251             const bool needed = ret.needed();
00252             ( ret = val ).needed() = needed;
00253         } else if( ret->is<T>() ) {
00254             ret->cast_to<T>() = val;
00255         } else { // don't overwrite allready set properties with a different type
00256             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Property " << MSubject( key ) << " is allready set to " << MSubject( ret.toString( true ) ) << " won't override with " << MSubject( Type<T>( val ).toString( true ) );
00257         }
00258 
00259         return ret;
00260     }

00300 // OK, lets define treeNode
00301 namespace isis
00302 {
00303 namespace util
00304 {
00305 namespace _internal
00306 {
00307 class treeNode
00308 {
00309     PropMap m_branch;
00310     PropertyValue m_leaf;
00311 public:
00312     bool empty()const {
00313         return m_branch.empty() && m_leaf.empty();
00314     }
00315     bool is_leaf()const {
00316         LOG_IF( ! ( m_branch.empty() || m_leaf.empty() ), Debug, error ) << "There is a non empty leaf at a branch. This should not be.";
00317         return m_branch.empty();
00318     }
00319     const PropMap &getBranch()const {
00320         return m_branch;
00321     }
00322     PropMap &getBranch() {
00323         return m_branch;
00324     }
00325     PropertyValue &getLeaf() {
00326         assert( is_leaf() );
00327         return m_leaf;
00328     }
00329     const PropertyValue &getLeaf()const {
00330         assert( is_leaf() );
00331         return m_leaf;
00332     }
00333     bool operator==( const treeNode &ref )const {
00334         return m_branch == ref.m_branch && m_leaf == ref.m_leaf;
00335     }
00336     std::string toString()const {
00337         std::ostringstream o;
00338         o << *this;
00339         return o.str();
00340     }
00341 };
00342 }
00343 
00344 // and now we can define walkTree (needs treeNode to be defined)
00345 template<class Predicate> struct PropMap::walkTree {
00346     key_list &m_out;
00347     const key_type m_prefix;
00348     walkTree( key_list &out, const key_type &prefix ): m_out( out ), m_prefix( prefix ) {}
00349     walkTree( key_list &out ): m_out( out ) {}
00350     void operator()( const_reference ref ) const {
00351         if ( ref.second.is_leaf() ) {
00352             if ( Predicate()( ref ) )
00353                 m_out.insert( m_out.end(), ( m_prefix != "" ? m_prefix + "/" : "" ) + ref.first );
00354         } else {
00355             const PropMap &sub = ref.second.getBranch();
00356             std::for_each( sub.begin(), sub.end(), walkTree<Predicate>( m_out, ref.first ) );
00357         }
00358     }
00359 };
00360 
00361 // as well as PropMap::getProperty ...
00362 template<typename T> T PropMap::getProperty( const key_type &key ) const
00363 {
00364     const mapped_type *entry = findEntry( util::istring( key ) );
00365 
00366     if( entry ) {
00367         const PropertyValue &ref = entry->getLeaf();
00368 
00369         if( !ref.empty() )
00370             return ref->as<T>();
00371     }
00372 
00373     LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Returning " << Type<T>().toString( true ) << " because property " << key << " does not exist";
00374     return T();
00375 }
00376 
00377 }
00378 }
00379 
00380 // and finally define the streaming output for treeNode
00381 namespace std
00382 {
00384 template<typename charT, typename traits>
00385 basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out, const isis::util::_internal::treeNode &s )
00386 {
00387     if( s.is_leaf() )
00388         out << s.getLeaf();
00389     else
00390         out << "[[Subtree with " << s.getBranch().getKeys().size() << " elements]]";
00391 
00392     return out;
00393 }
00395 template<typename charT, typename traits>
00396 basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out, const isis::util::PropMap &s )
00397 {
00398     isis::util::PropMap::flat_map buff;
00399     s.linearize( buff );
00400     isis::util::write_list( buff.begin(), buff.end(), out );
00401     return out;
00402 }
00403 }
